name: Friggin' Zombies
description:
Friggin' Zombies is a unique tower-defense game in which the player is the only line of defense against swarms of zombies out to destroy buildings. The player must be both accurate and quick as they earn headshots against wave after wave of brain-craving undead.

The goal is to shoot approaching zombies in the head before they reach the town buildings. Once zombies reach their destination, they will begin attacking the structure and eventually will destroy it. If you find yourself overwhelmed, there are explosive barrels placed around the level which can be used to wipe out a large number of zombies with a single shot.

This game is in the final stages of it's developments, and a full release will be available shortly.
